Title: First Blood
Overview: When former Green Beret John Rambo is harassed by local law enforcement and arrested for vagrancy, he is forced to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.
Tagline: This time he's fighting for his life.
Keywords: prison, vietnam veteran, falsely accused, police brutality, sheriff, guerrilla, submachine gun, gun, destroy, self-defense, vietnam, vietnam war, prosecution, dying and death, village and town, police operation, attempt to escape, matter of life and death, survivor, tramp, national guard, weapon, firearm, police, escape
Cast: Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Brian Dennehy
